titleStmt.title: The island-princess as it is acted at the theatre royal / reviv'd with alterations by N. Tate ...
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.H. for W. Canning, at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: The island princess, or, Generous Portugals.
An adaptation by Nahum Tate of John Fletcher's work of the same name--cf. Cambridge hist. Eng. Lit., VIII, 120.
Imperfect: pages 55-56 torn with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
